channel.title: R on Stats On the T
channel.description: Recent content in R on Stats On the T

item.title: Cape Town celebrates R and tennis data science at satRday
item.description: While Roger Federer earned his 17th straight win of 2018, tennis data science was taking a center stage at Cape Town’s satRday conference.

item.title: Software
item.description: Software for tennis data scraping and analysis. R package deuce for accessing and wrangling with historical tennis data R package slam-sofascoreR for scraping Grand Slam data from Sofa Scorer Sports Analytics with R Tutorial All other code at github/skoval
